Author: isaezraa
Text: I make sure I get enough protein (0.8x your weight in kg) and I drink at least 4L of water a day

Author: Crotchetylilkitten
Text: I do a protien shake because it keeps me full. They are calorically dense. It's hard to get past mentally. But it's less stressful that actually having to eat my protien. Plus you probably don't need a full serving of it at once. Most are 20-30g or protien per serving. So I do half and it gets me through a workout without the light headed BS, and the hangry period after.
